items.sentence: Let\'s get this over with, once and for all.
The Jacksons have three dogs and three cats.
Tom swore he didn\'t tell anyone our secret.
Tom swore that he hadn\'t seen Mary all day.
I don\'t think I\'ll need an umbrella today.
Tom and Mary were too tired to work anymore.
Most of the participants are from Australia.
I don\'t think anybody\'s going to help you.
The smell didn\'t seem to bother Tom at all.
Tom often talks to himself when he\'s alone.
Tom asked Mary what hospital she\'d gone to.
Tom, be careful you don\'t fall in the hole.
Why are there no taxis at the station today?
I\'ve decided to go back to Boston with Tom.
I didn\'t know you didn\'t know how to swim.
Tom crushed the cardboard box with his foot.
Tom decided to sell his business and retire.
Tom decided to sell one of his cars to Mary.
Nobody knows why this kind of thing happens.
Nobody wants to do it, but one of us has to.
